title: Diamond and Emerald Bridal Choker with South Sea Pearls - "Navarathna Haram"
materials: 1.82 carats Rubies. South Sea Pearls with excellent luster. Hyderabadi polish.
features: Intricately designed choker with a floral diamond pattern and a cascading pearl fringe. Features two central emerald-studded pendants with a floral motif. The choker's design blends traditional Hyderabadi craftsmanship with a modern aesthetic. Contains natural south sea pearls dangling from the choker and the pendant. It's a blend of traditional craftsmanship and modern design.
description: This Navarathna Haaram is a statement piece, blending traditional South Indian design with the brilliance of diamonds and the elegance of pearls. The craftsmanship reflects the rich heritage of Hyderabad, offering a timeless piece for your most special occasions. The combination of emeralds and rubies brings prosperity and good luck, making it more than just jewelry but a symbol of blessings for the wearer. A true heirloom piece to be treasured for generations.
